name: FG standard vs actual weight
query:
select
si.name as "Sales Invoice ID:Link/Sales Invoice:300",
i.item_code as "Item code::200",
i.item_name as "Item Name::200",
i.total_net_weight as "Actual Weight::200",
COALESCE(((i.total_net_weight*100)/(i.total_weight))-(100),0) as "Over/Under::200"
from `tabSales Invoice` si join `tabSales Invoice Item` i
where si.name=i.parent order by si.creation desc;
